mapper.select: SELECT post.code, post.series_code, series.title AS series_title, user.nickname, user.profile_image, post.user_code, post.title AS post_title, post.content, post.confirm_content, post.thumbnail_image, post.views, post.price, post.is_paid, post.is_adult, post.is_public, post.is_deleted, post.create_date, post.update_date FROM `like` JOIN post ON post.code = `like`.post_code -- 시리즈 NULL 값 일수있기때문에 LEFT JOIN LEFT JOIN series ON post.series_code = series.code JOIN user ON post.user_code = user.code WHERE `like`.user_code = #{userCode}

SELECT post.code, post.series_code, series.title AS series_title, user.nickname, user.profile_image, post.user_code, post.title AS post_title, post.content, post.confirm_content, post.thumbnail_image, post.views, post.price, post.is_paid, post.is_adult, post.is_public, post.is_deleted, post.create_date, post.update_date FROM `like` JOIN post ON post.code = `like`.post_code LEFT JOIN series ON post.series_code = series.code JOIN user ON post.user_code = user.code WHERE post.code = #{code} AND post.series_code = #{seriesCode};
